title: What is this san serif font?
content:
Please help. Thank you very much :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [publications\_page.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418191013/http:/typophile.com/files/publications_page.jpeg) | 28.67 KB |
author: francis_abtik

comments.content:
It looks like the latin subset of **[Euphemia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418191013/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Euphemia%20-%20Regular&fid=5c81010800152b142ea357ccbee8c40e&fsize=60&text=Biff%20Ward&wrap=2)** by Tiro Typeworks [2006].  
This is distributed with both Windows & Mac OS to support "Unified Canadian Aboriginal Syllabics" symbols.
Thank you for the help. I appreciate it :)
